Package com.acmol.risk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArmyInitializer
    Interface for allocating the army at the beginning of a game.
    PathFinder
    Interface for verifying paths for the fortify action Please see the BasicPathfinder class for the basic rule Please see the AlternatePathfinder class for the alternate rule
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlternatePathfinder
    Verify paths for the fortify action considering the alternate rule Alternate Rule: You can move pieces anywhere, as long as the starting point and destination can be reached by going through a string of adjacent territories under your control Please see the PathFinder interface Please see the BasicPathfinder class for the standard rule
    Application
    Main run point
    BasicPathfinder
    Verify paths for the fortify action considering the standard rule Standard Rule: Move any number of army pieces from a single territory into an adjacent territory occupied by you Please see the PathFinder interface Please see the AlternatePathfinder class for the alternate rule
    Card
    Class that represents the Card game object.
    Continent
    A Continent that contains its Territory list.
    GameController
    Controller that handles the RISK game logic.
    GameMessage
    Message subtype for giving the client a response with the game board information that interests the client.
    ManualInitializer
    Class for allocating the army at the beginning of a game.
    Message
    Message supertype for the client response.
    Player
    Class that handles the Player object attributes.
    RandomInitializer
    Class for allocating the army at the beginning of a game.
    ServerController
    WebServer endpoint for players.
    StringMessage
    Message subtype for giving the client a simple text response.
    Territory
    Class that handles the Territory object attributes.
    WebSocketConfig
    Class used for the WebServer endpoint configuration.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CardType
    Enumeration for all the Card's type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArmyInitializer.IncorretPlayerNumber
